original_title: Strawberry Shortcake: A Berry Grand Opening
overview: Strawberry is about to open her new caf√©. She sends the Berrykins to pick the items she needs from her friends. Unfortunately, the Berrykins are so excited that they mishear or forget what Strawberry told them. Nevertheless, everything goes well to the delight of everyone.
title: Strawberry Shortcake: A Berry Grand Opening
